title: JSON schema for configuring a Figma plugin built with the Create Figma Plugin toolkit

src.description:
Required.
Path to the main entry point of the plugin command.

handler.description:
Required.
The name of the exported function in the file.

oneOf.description: A separator between plugins commands in the menu.

name.description:
(Required)
The name of the plugin command.

main.description:
(Required, unless "menu" is specified)
Path to the main entry point of the plugin command. The plugin command must be the function set as the `default` export of the file. To use a particular named export instead, specify an object with "src" (required) and "handler" (required) keys.

ui.description:
(Optional)
Path to the UI implementation of the plugin command (as specified via the sibling "main" key). The UI implementation must be the function set as the `default` export of the file. To use a particular named export instead, specify an object with "src" (required) and "handler" (required) keys.

menu.description:
(Required, unless "main" is specified)
Sub-menus can be nested.

apiVersion.description:
(Optional)
The version of the Figma plugin API to use. Defaults to "1.0.0".

id.description:
(Required to publish the plugin on Figma Community)
The plugin ID. This field can be omitted during development but is required if you want to publish your plugin. Figma will generate a unique plugin ID for you when you first try to publish the plugin; copy and paste that ID here.

main.description:
(Required, unless "menu" is specified)
Path to the main entry point of the plugin command. The plugin command must be the function set as the `default` export of the file. To use a particular named export instead, specify an object with "src" (required) and "handler" (required) keys.

ui.description:
(Optional)
Path to the UI implementation of the plugin command (as specified via the sibling "main" key). The UI implementation must be the function set as the `default` export of the file. To use a particular named export instead, specify an object with "src" (required) and "handler" (required) keys.

menu.description:
(Required, unless "main" is specified)
An array that specifies the commands shown in the pluginâ€™s sub-menu. Each object in the array has the keys "name" (required), "main" (required), "ui" (optional), and "menu" (optional). Use a "-" in the array to specify a separator between commands in the sub-menu.

relaunchButtons.description:
(Optional)
An object that specifies the commands that can be set as relaunch buttons. Each key is a `relaunchButtonId`. Each value specifies the relaunch button command, and is an object with the keys "name" (required), "main" (required), "ui" (optional), and "multipleSelection" (optional).

name.description:
(Required)
The name of the relaunch button.

main.description:
(Required)
Path to the main entry point of the plugin command. The plugin command must be the function set as the `default` export of the file. To use a particular named export instead, specify an object with "src" (required) and "handler" (required) keys.

ui.description:
(Optional)
Path to the UI implementation of the plugin command (as specified via the sibling "main" key). The UI implementation must be the function set as the `default` export of the file. To use a particular named export instead, specify an object with "src" (required) and "handler" (required) keys.

multipleSelection.description:
(Optional)
Whether the relaunch button should appear when multiple layers are selected.

enablePrivatePluginApi.description:
(Optional)
Allow use of plugin APIs that are only available to private plugins.

enableProposedApi.description:
(Optional)
Allow use of Proposed APIs that are only available during development.
